DOC.brief_summary: Female sexual dysfunction , include sexual arousal disorder , significant clinical impact , affect million woman United States alone . Subjects randomize receive one stimulation approach . Subjects weekly 30-minute session across twelve week .
DOC.criteria: Adult woman ≥ 18 year age Sexually active ≥ 1 time per month ( ≥ 2 time per month prefer ) Score 19 less 6question set Female Sexual Function Index ( FSFI ) survey Neurologically stable Ambulatory Capable give informed consent English speaking Capable willing follow study procedure Men Women ≤ 17 year age Pregnant planning get pregnant study period Clinically diagnose neurological bladder dysfunction Prior experience PTNS DGNS Current use transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation ( TENS ) pelvis , back , leg Implanted pacemaker , defibrillator , spinal cord stimulator , sacral root stimulator Taking flibanserin Taking investigational drug History neurologic diseases impairment Any factor investigator feel would place patient increase risk study
